option.replayfps.use_clientcap.tooltip: Whether to use the client-capture playback system in the first place.
option.replayfps.drawhud.tooltip: Render the HUD (hotbar, etc) in replay renderings.
option.replayfps.drawhotbar.tooltip: Show the hotbar in replay renderings.
option.replayfps.drawscreens.tooltip: Render supported screens when appropriate (signs, inventory, etc.)
